column5: Anyone know if the salmon are in Hamilton Harbour yet? Spent 6 hours there yesterday and no salmon, although the 15lb 37 inch pike off of LaSalle park made it worth while ?
Salmon are pretty well done.  Upstream spawning and many are dead.
Thanks. Surprised, thought it would have been later due to warm water, they only came into Bronte last week.
There were loads of salmon in Bronte a month ago - they're pretty much done now, just a few stragglers left
we were spotting salmon 8 weeks ago in the credit  I caught one a month ago to the day
Time to chase those Browns and Coho's
Ya, caught this one at LaSalle.
Ya, caught this one at LaSalle.
Looks like they are just starting in Hamilton Harbour.......  https://www.thespec.com/news-story/7767606-return-of-the-salmon-and-other-hamilton-harbour-fish-tales/

Looks like they are just starting in Hamilton Harbour.......  https://www.thespec.com/news-story/7767606-return-of-the-salmon-and-other-hamilton-harbour-fish-tales/   sounds like those walleye are getting fat on rud, goldfish and gobies ahaha  8lb smallies coming to a harbour near you!
